summary: Completed comprehensive testing of redesigned Choose Plan page with interactive carousel layout. All core functionality working correctly including plan selection, carousel navigation, modal interactions, and proper navigation to Store Details page.
passed_tests: ✅ Page loads at /onboarding/choose-plan with Gold plan centered by default
✅ 4 plan selector pills visible: Free, Silver, Gold (active/dark), Platinum
✅ Gold pill shows pulse dot when not selected
✅ Center card (Gold) has gradient border, 'Best Deal' badge, large $79 price, '+2 months free' highlight, 'Selected Plan' CTA button
✅ Side cards are smaller with 'Select Plan' outline button
✅ Clicking pills slides carousel to center selected card with correct gradients (Silver: blue-cyan, Platinum: violet-purple, Free: slate)
✅ Carousel prev/next arrows work with proper disabled states
✅ Direct card clicking selects and centers the plan
✅ Selected confirmation pill shows correct plan name and price
✅ Continue button shows 'Continue with {planName}' and navigates to /onboarding/store-details
✅ Store Details page shows Step 2 of 4 correctly
✅ Compare plans modal opens with feature comparison table and close button works
✅ Helper text 'You can change your plan later from Settings.' is visible
✅ Keyboard navigation works (Enter key on pills)
